verses.verse: וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> The word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> came again unto me saying
וְאַתָּ֣ה <WH859> and you בֶן־ <WH1121> Now thou son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man שָׂ֥א <WH5375> take up עַל־ <WH5921> over צֹ֖ר <WH6865> for Tyrus קִינָֽה׃ <WH7015> a lamentation

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> And say לְצ֗וֹר <WH6865> unto Tyrus [הַיֹּשְׁבֹתֵי כ] (הַיֹּשֶׁ֙בֶת֙ <WH3427> abide ק) עַל־ <WH5921> at מְבוֹאֹ֣ת <WH3996> the entrance יָ֔ם <WH3220> of the sea רֹכֶ֙לֶת֙ <WH7402> [which art] a merchant הָֽעַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> of the people אֶל־ <WH413> about אִיִּ֖ים <WH339> isles רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> for many כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3068> GOD צ֕וֹר <WH6865> O Tyrus אַ֣תְּ <WH859> you אָמַ֔רְתְּ <WH559> thou hast said אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am כְּלִ֥ילַת <WH3632> I [am] of perfect יֹֽפִי׃ <WH3308> beauty
בְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> [are] in the midst יַמִּ֖ים <WH3220> of the seas גְּבוּלָ֑יִךְ <WH1366> Thy borders בֹּנַ֕יִךְ <WH1129> thy builders כָּלְל֖וּ <WH3634> have perfected יָפְיֵֽךְ׃ <WH3308> thy beauty

בְּרוֹשִׁ֤ים <WH1265> of fir trees מִשְּׂנִיר֙ <WH8149> of Senir בָּ֣נוּ <WH1129> They have made לָ֔ךְ אֵ֖ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all לֻֽחֹתָ֑יִם <WH3871> all thy [ship] boards אֶ֤רֶז <WH730> cedars מִלְּבָנוֹן֙ <WH3844> from Lebanon לָקָ֔חוּ <WH3947> they have taken לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> to make תֹּ֖רֶן <WH8650> masts עָלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5921> of

אַלּוֹנִים֙ <WH437> [Of] the oaks מִבָּ֔שָׁן <WH1316> of Bashan עָשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> have they made מִשּׁוֹטָ֑יִךְ <WH4880> thine oars קַרְשֵׁ֤ךְ <WH7175> thy benches עָֽשׂוּ־ <WH6213> have made שֵׁן֙ <WH8127> [of] ivory בַּת־ <WH1323> the company אֲשֻׁרִ֔ים <WH839> of the Ashurites מֵאִיֵּ֖י <WH339> [brought] out of the isles [כִּתִּיִּם כ] (כִּתִּיִּֽים׃ <WH3794> Chittim ק)

שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8336> Fine linen בְּרִקְמָ֤ה <WH7553> with broidered work מִמִּצְרַ֙יִם֙ <WH4714> from Egypt הָיָ֣ה <WH1961> became מִפְרָשֵׂ֔ךְ <WH4666> was that which thou spreadest forth לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> became לָ֖ךְ לְנֵ֑ס <WH5251> to be thy sail תְּכֵ֧לֶת <WH8504> blue וְאַרְגָּמָ֛ן <WH713> and purple מֵאִיֵּ֥י <WH339> from the isles אֱלִישָׁ֖ה <WH473> of Elishah הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> became מְכַסֵּֽךְ׃ <WH4374> was that which covered

יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> The inhabitants צִידוֹן֙ <WH6721> of Zidon וְאַרְוַ֔ד <WH719> and Arvad הָי֥וּ <WH1961> become שָׁטִ֖ים <WH7751> were thy mariners לָ֑ךְ חֲכָמַ֤יִךְ <WH2450> thy wise צוֹר֙ <WH6865> [men] O Tyrus הָ֣יוּ <WH1961> become בָ֔ךְ הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they חֹבְלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH2259> [that] were in thee were thy pilots

זִקְנֵ֨י <WH2205> The ancients גְבַ֤ל <WH1380> of Gebal וַחֲכָמֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH2450> and the wise הָ֣יוּ <WH1961> become בָ֔ךְ מַחֲזִיקֵ֖י <WH2388> repairing בִּדְקֵ֑ךְ <WH919> your seams כָּל־ <WH3605> All אֳנִיּ֨וֹת <WH591> all the ships הַיָּ֤ם <WH3220> of the sea וּמַלָּֽחֵיהֶם֙ <WH4419> with their mariners הָ֣יוּ <WH1961> become בָ֔ךְ לַעֲרֹ֖ב <WH6148> were in thee to occupy מַעֲרָבֵֽךְ׃ <WH4627> thy merchandise

פָּרַ֨ס <WH6539> They of Persia וְל֤וּד <WH3865> and of Lud וּפוּט֙ <WH6316> and of Phut הָי֣וּ <WH1961> were in בְחֵילֵ֔ךְ <WH2428> were in thine army אַנְשֵׁ֖י <WH376> your men מִלְחַמְתֵּ֑ךְ <WH4421> of war מָגֵ֤ן <WH4043> the shield וְכוֹבַע֙ <WH3553> and helmet תִּלּוּ־ <WH8518> they hanged בָ֔ךְ הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they נָתְנ֥וּ <WH5414> in thee they set forth הֲדָרֵֽךְ׃ <WH1926> thy comeliness

בְּנֵ֧י <WH1121> The men אַרְוַ֣ד <WH719> of Arvad וְחֵילֵ֗ךְ <WH2428> with thine army עַל־ <WH5921> were on חוֹמוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH2346> [were] upon thy walls סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about וְגַ֨מָּדִ֔ים <WH1575> and the Gammadims בְּמִגְדְּלוֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH4026> were in thy towers הָי֑וּ <WH1961> become שִׁלְטֵיהֶ֞ם <WH7982> their shields תִּלּ֤וּ <WH8518> they hanged עַל־ <WH5921> on חוֹמוֹתַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH2346> upon thy walls סָבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they כָּלְל֥וּ <WH3634> perfect יָפְיֵֽךְ׃ <WH3308> thy beauty

תַּרְשִׁ֥ישׁ <WH8659> Tarshish סֹחַרְתֵּ֖ךְ <WH5503> [was] thy merchant מֵרֹ֣ב <WH7230> by reason of the multitude כָּל־ <WH3605> of all ה֑וֹן <WH1952> of all [kind of] riches בְּכֶ֤סֶף <WH3701> with silver בַּרְזֶל֙ <WH1270> iron בְּדִ֣יל <WH913> tin וְעוֹפֶ֔רֶת <WH5777> and lead נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> they traded עִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5801> in thy fairs

יָוָ֤ן <WH3120> Javan תֻּבַל֙ <WH8422> Tubal וָמֶ֔שֶׁךְ <WH4902> and Meshech הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they רֹֽכְלָ֑יִךְ <WH7402> they [were] thy merchants בְּנֶ֤פֶשׁ <WH5315> the persons אָדָם֙ <WH120> of men וּכְלֵ֣י <WH3627> and vessels נְחֹ֔שֶׁת <WH5178> of brass נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> they traded מַעֲרָבֵֽךְ׃ <WH4627> in thy market

מִבֵּ֖ית <WH1004> They of the house תּוֹגַרְמָ֑ה <WH8425> of Togarmah סוּסִ֤ים <WH5483> with horses וּפָֽרָשִׁים֙ <WH6571> and horsemen וּפְרָדִ֔ים <WH6505> and mules נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> traded עִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5801> in thy fairs

בְּנֵ֤י <WH1121> The men דְדָן֙ <WH1719> of Dedan רֹֽכְלַ֔יִךְ <WH7402> [were] thy merchants אִיִּ֥ים <WH339> isles רַבִּ֖ים <WH7227> many סְחֹרַ֣ת <WH5506> [were] the merchandise יָדֵ֑ךְ <WH3027> of thine hand קַרְנ֥וֹת <WH7161> horns שֵׁן֙ <WH8127> of ivory [וְהֹובְנִים כ] (וְהָבְנִ֔ים <WH1894> ebony ק) הֵשִׁ֖יבוּ <WH7725> they brought אֶשְׁכָּרֵֽךְ׃ <WH814> thee [for] a present

אֲרָ֥ם <WH758> Syria סֹחַרְתֵּ֖ךְ <WH5503> [was] thy merchant מֵרֹ֣ב <WH7230> by reason of the multitude מַעֲשָׂ֑יִךְ <WH4639> of the wares of thy making בְּ֠נֹפֶךְ <WH5306> with emeralds אַרְגָּמָ֨ן <WH713> purple וְרִקְמָ֤ה <WH7553> and broidered work וּבוּץ֙ <WH948> and fine linen וְרָאמֹ֣ת <WH7215> and coral וְכַדְכֹּ֔ד <WH3539> and agate נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> they occupied בְּעִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5801> in thy fairs

יְהוּדָה֙ <WH3063> Judah וְאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> and the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they רֹכְלָ֑יִךְ <WH7402> they [were] thy merchants בְּחִטֵּ֣י <WH2406> wheat מִ֠נִּית <WH4511> of Minnith וּפַנַּ֨ג <WH6436> and Pannag וּדְבַ֤שׁ <WH1706> and honey וָשֶׁ֙מֶן֙ <WH8081> and oil וָצֹ֔רִי <WH6875> and balm נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> they traded מַעֲרָבֵֽךְ׃ <WH4627> in thy market

דַּמֶּ֧שֶׂק <WH1834> Damascus סֹחַרְתֵּ֛ךְ <WH5503> [was] thy merchant בְּרֹ֥ב <WH7230> in the multitude מַעֲשַׂ֖יִךְ <WH4639> of the wares of thy making מֵרֹ֣ב <WH7230> for the multitude כָּל־ <WH3605> of all ה֑וֹן <WH1952> of all riches בְּיֵ֥ין <WH3196> in the wine חֶלְבּ֖וֹן <WH2463> of Helbon וְצֶ֥מֶר <WH6785> wool צָֽחַר׃ <WH6713> and white

וְדָ֤ן <WH1835> Dan וְיָוָן֙ <WH3120> also and Javan מְאוּזָּ֔ל <WH235> going to and fro בְּעִזְבוֹנַ֖יִךְ <WH5801> in thy fairs נָתָ֑נּוּ <WH5414> occupied בַּרְזֶ֤ל <WH1270> iron עָשׁוֹת֙ <WH6219> bright קִדָּ֣ה <WH6916> cassia וְקָנֶ֔ה <WH7070> and calamus בְּמַעֲרָבֵ֖ךְ <WH4627> were in thy market הָיָֽה׃ <WH1961> become
דְּדָן֙ <WH1719> Dedan רֹֽכַלְתֵּ֔ךְ <WH7402> [was] thy merchant בְבִגְדֵי־ <WH899> clothes חֹ֖פֶשׁ <WH2667> in precious לְרִכְבָּֽה׃ <WH7396> for chariots

עֲרַב֙ <WH6152> Arabia וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all נְשִׂיאֵ֣י <WH5387> and all the princes קֵדָ֔ר <WH6938> of Kedar הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they סֹחֲרֵ֣י <WH5503> in these [were they] thy merchants יָדֵ֑ךְ <WH3027> with thee בְּכָרִ֤ים <WH3733> in lambs וְאֵילִים֙ <WH352> and rams וְעַתּוּדִ֔ים <WH6260> and goats בָּ֖ם סֹחֲרָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5503> were your customers

רֹכְלֵ֤י <WH7402> The merchants שְׁבָא֙ <WH7614> of Sheba וְרַעְמָ֔ה <WH7484> and Raamah הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> they רֹכְלָ֑יִךְ <WH7402> they [were] thy merchants בְּרֹ֨אשׁ <WH7218> with chief כָּל־ <WH3605> of all בֹּ֜שֶׂם <WH1314> of all spices וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֤בֶן <WH68> stones יְקָרָה֙ <WH3368> and with all precious וְזָהָ֔ב <WH2091> and gold נָתְנ֖וּ <WH5414> they occupied עִזְבוֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5801> in thy fairs

חָרָ֤ן <WH2771> Haran וְכַנֵּה֙ <WH3656> and Canneh וָעֶ֔דֶן <WH5729> and Eden רֹכְלֵ֖י <WH7402> the merchants שְׁבָ֑א <WH7614> of Sheba אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> Asshur כִּלְמַ֥ד <WH3638> [and] Chilmad רֹכַלְתֵּֽךְ׃ <WH7402> [were] thy merchants

הֵ֤מָּה <WH1992> They רֹכְלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH7402> These [were] thy merchants בְּמַכְלֻלִ֔ים <WH4360> in all sorts בִּגְלוֹמֵי֙ <WH1545> clothes תְּכֵ֣לֶת <WH8504> [of things] in blue וְרִקְמָ֔ה <WH7553> and broidered work וּבְגִנְזֵ֖י <WH1595> and in chests בְּרֹמִ֑ים <WH1264> of rich apparel בַּחֲבָלִ֧ים <WH2256> with cords חֲבֻשִׁ֛ים <WH2280> bound וַאֲרֻזִ֖ים <WH729> and made of cedar בְּמַרְכֻלְתֵּֽךְ׃ <WH4819> among thy merchandise

אֳנִיּ֣וֹת <WH591> The ships תַּרְשִׁ֔ישׁ <WH8659> of Tarshish שָׁרוֹתַ֖יִךְ <WH7788> did sing מַעֲרָבֵ֑ךְ <WH4627> of thee in thy market וַתִּמָּלְאִ֧י <WH4390> and thou wast replenished וַֽתִּכְבְּדִ֛י <WH3513> glorious מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> and made very בְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> in the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <WH3220> of the seas

בְּמַ֤יִם <WH4325> waters רַבִּים֙ <WH7227> thee into great הֱבִיא֔וּךְ <WH935> have brought הַשָּׁטִ֖ים <WH7751> Thy rowers אֹתָ֑ךְ <WH853> ר֚וּחַ <WH7307> wind הַקָּדִ֔ים <WH6921> the east שְׁבָרֵ֖ךְ <WH7665> hath broken בְּלֵ֥ב <WH3820> thee in the midst יַמִּֽים׃ <WH3220> of the seas

הוֹנֵךְ֙ <WH1952> Thy riches וְעִזְבוֹנַ֔יִךְ <WH5801> and thy fairs מַעֲרָבֵ֕ךְ <WH4627> thy merchandise מַלָּחַ֖יִךְ <WH4419> thy mariners וְחֹבְלָ֑יִךְ <WH2259> and thy pilots מַחֲזִיקֵ֣י <WH2388> your repairers בִדְקֵ֣ך <WH919> of seams וְֽעֹרְבֵ֣י <WH6148> and the occupiers מַ֠עֲרָבֵךְ <WH4627> of thy merchandise וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all אַנְשֵׁ֨י <WH376> your men מִלְחַמְתֵּ֜ךְ <WH4421> of war אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֗ךְ וּבְכָל־ <WH3605> all קְהָלֵךְ֙ <WH6951> that [are] in thee and in all thy company אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בְּתוֹכֵ֔ךְ <WH8432> which [is] in the midst יִפְּלוּ֙ <WH5307> of thee shall fall בְּלֵ֣ב <WH3820> into the midst יַמִּ֔ים <WH3220> of the seas בְּי֖וֹם <WH3117> in the day מַפַּלְתֵּֽךְ׃ <WH4658> of thy ruin
לְק֖וֹל <WH6963> at the sound זַעֲקַ֣ת <WH2201> of the cry חֹבְלָ֑יִךְ <WH2259> of thy pilots יִרְעֲשׁ֖וּ <WH7493> shall shake מִגְרֹשֽׁוֹת׃ <WH4054> The suburbs

וְֽיָרְד֞וּ <WH3381> shall come down מֵאָנִיּֽוֹתֵיהֶ֗ם <WH591> from their ships כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> All תֹּפְשֵׂ֣י <WH8610> And all that handle מָשׁ֔וֹט <WH4880> the oar מַלָּחִ֕ים <WH4419> the mariners כֹּ֖ל <WH3605> all חֹבְלֵ֣י <WH2259> [and] all the pilots הַיָּ֑ם <WH3220> of the sea אֶל־ <WH413> on הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> upon the land יַעֲמֹֽדוּ׃ <WH5975> they shall stand

וְהִשְׁמִ֤יעוּ <WH8085> to be heard עָלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5921> over בְּקוֹלָ֔ם <WH6963> And shall cause their voice וְיִזְעֲק֖וּ <WH2199> against thee and shall cry מָרָ֑ה <WH4751> bitterly וְיַעֲל֤וּ <WH5927> and shall cast up עָֽפָר֙ <WH6083> dust עַל־ <WH5921> over רָ֣אשֵׁיהֶ֔ם <WH7218> upon their heads בָּאֵ֖פֶר <WH665> themselves in the ashes יִתְפַּלָּֽשׁוּ׃ <WH6428> they shall wallow

וְהִקְרִ֤יחוּ <WH7139> bald אֵלַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH413> and קָרְחָ֔ה <WH7144> And they shall make themselves utterly וְחָגְר֖וּ <WH2296> for thee and gird שַׂקִּ֑ים <WH8242> them with sackcloth וּבָכ֥וּ <WH1058> and they shall weep אֵלַ֛יִךְ <WH413> for בְּמַר־ <WH4751> for thee with bitterness נֶ֖פֶשׁ <WH5315> of heart מִסְפֵּ֥ד <WH4553> wailing מָֽר׃ <WH4751> [and] bitter

וְנָשְׂא֨וּ <WH5375> they shall take up אֵלַ֤יִךְ <WH413> and בְּנִיהֶם֙ <WH5204> And in their wailing קִינָ֔ה <WH7015> a lamentation וְקוֹנְנ֖וּ <WH6969> for thee and lament עָלָ֑יִךְ <WH5921> over מִ֣י <WH4310> Who כְצ֔וֹר <WH6865> over thee [saying] What [city is] like Tyrus כְּדֻמָ֖ה <WH1822> like the destroyed בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in the midst הַיָּֽם׃ <WH3220> sea

בְּצֵ֤את <WH3318> went forth עִזְבוֹנַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH5801> When thy wares מִיַּמִּ֔ים <WH3220> out of the seas הִשְׂבַּ֖עַתְּ <WH7646> thou filledst עַמִּ֣ים <WH5971> people רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many בְּרֹ֤ב <WH7230> with the multitude הוֹנַ֙יִךְ֙ <WH1952> of thy riches וּמַ֣עֲרָבַ֔יִךְ <WH4627> and of thy merchandise הֶעֱשַׁ֖רְתְּ <WH6238> thou didst enrich מַלְכֵי־ <WH4428> the kings אָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

עֵ֛ת <WH6256> In the time נִשְׁבֶּ֥רֶת <WH7665> [when] thou shalt be broken מִיַּמִּ֖ים <WH3220> by the seas בְּמַֽעֲמַקֵּי־ <WH4615> in the depths מָ֑יִם <WH4325> of the waters מַעֲרָבֵ֥ךְ <WH4627> thy merchandise וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all קְהָלֵ֖ךְ <WH6951> and all thy company בְּתוֹכֵ֥ךְ <WH8432> in the midst נָפָֽלוּ׃ <WH5307> of thee shall fall

כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> All יֹשְׁבֵ֣י <WH3427> All the inhabitants הָאִיִּ֔ים <WH339> of the isles שָׁמְמ֖וּ <WH8074> shall be astonished עָלָ֑יִךְ <WH5921> and וּמַלְכֵיהֶם֙ <WH4428> at thee and their kings שָׂ֣עֲרוּ <WH8175> afraid שַׂ֔עַר <WH8178> shall be sore רָעֲמ֖וּ <WH7481> they shall be troubled פָּנִֽים׃ <WH6440> in [their] countenance

סֹֽחֲרִים֙ <WH5503> The merchants בָּ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> among the people שָׁרְק֖וּ <WH8319> shall hiss עָלָ֑יִךְ <WH5921> and בַּלָּה֣וֹת <WH1091> at thee thou shalt be a terror הָיִ֔ית <WH1961> have become וְאֵינֵ֖ךְ <WH369> will cease עַד־ <WH5704> against עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> alway ס
